description.value:
Requirements It is your turn, you meet a condition determined by your limit style, and you are not currently under the effects of one of your limit breaks.

Frequency a number of times per day equal to your Limit Rank

You lash out with a surge of adrenaline, pushing beyond your normal limits. You may use one of your known Limit Break feats.

Some Limit Breaks require saving throws from enemies. These saving throws use your class DC or spellcasting DC, whichever is higher, and will be called Limit Break DCs.

Special While the Limit Break activity is a free action, the limit breaks themselves have their own action costs. Generally, 1st rank limit breaks take 1 action, while 2nd and 3rd rank limit breaks take 2 actions, and 4th rank limit breaks take 3 actions and are only usable once per day, regardless of your Limit Rank.
